segments.text: Daniel , I can't catch up with the English teacher very well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are quite good at English , can you help me with it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's OK . But you'd better take an additional course in some English schools .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This kind of school is good at helping people to improve their English .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that different from our school's English course ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , before you start your training , they will test you on your English first .
segments.speaker: S2
